battleList(uint256).notice: An array of all the battle identifiers that have been created.

battles(string).notice: Mapping of battle data, where the key is the battle's identifier and the value is the battle's data structure.

bossList(uint256).notice: An array of all the boss identifiers that have been created.

bosses(string).notice: Mapping of boss data, where the key is the boss's identifier and the value is the boss's data structure.

checkActiveBosses(string[]).notice: checks the boss is available or not

checkBattleEnded(string).notice: to check the battle Ended or not i.e true or false

checkBattleStatus(string).notice: function to check the battleStatus i.e true or false

checkBossStatus(string).notice: checks the boss is available or not

createBattle(string,string[],uint256,uin.notice: function to create battle requires battleId and bossId, starting time and ending time

createBoss(string,string,uint256,string).notice: Method to create a new boss.

getAllBattle().notice: return the list of all bosses

getAllBosses().notice: return the list of all bosses

getBattlePeriod(string).notice: gives the end time of an battle in unix

updateBattle(string,uint256,uint256).notice: function to update battle requires battleId, bossId, starting time and ending time along with battle status.         Note: 1. Battle should be inactive to be able to update.               2. If battle should be updated with new bosses or updated boss, new battle SHOULD be created

updateBoss(string,string,uint256,string).notice: function to update the boss character
